name: Seage
description:
Unfinished! My attempt at LD45. It's a tower defense-style game where you build platforms and turrets, then try to defend yourself from enemy ships, helicopters, and subs.

Playable, but a lot of SFX are not implemented, and there's no in-game instruction to speak of.

INSTRUCTIONS: During the building phase, click and drag components to place them. Recommend building at least one of each type of turret, since each type is used against a specific enemy type. After you're done building, click the arrow to proceed to the action phase. "Z" fires your SAMs, "X" fires your anti-ship gun, and "C" fires your depth charges. They all behave a bit differently, so pay attention!

Concept/coding by me. Art by Jaclyn, Toby, Cooper, and me. Music and SFX by Jarrod.
